sentences.english: A similar effort is under way in France on coffee plants.
sentences.chinese: 类似的工作正在法国展开，保存的是咖啡树种。

sentences.english: Hamilton euonymus is a good ornamental species.
sentences.chinese: 桃叶卫矛是优良的观赏树种。

sentences.english: The distribution area is mainly the acid yellow soil, and associated species is mainly masson's pine.
sentences.chinese: 分布区主要为黄壤类酸性土，伴生树种主要为马尾松。

sentences.english: Hippophae rhamnoides is a kind of pioneer plant in the gully slopes in Soft Sandstone Area (SSA) for eco-economical consideration.
sentences.chinese: 沙棘是砒砂岩区沟谷部位常用的一种生态恢复树种。

sentences.english: The Eucalyptus was the main pulp forest species in southern Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 桉树已成为湖南湘南地区栽培的主要纸浆林树种。

sentences.english: The fourth category has 32 plants of Cinnamomum camphora as the second grade national key protective plants.
sentences.chinese: 第四类有二级国家重点保护野生树种樟树32株。

sentences.english: Both tree species hug water sources in this arid land of high plateaus and rock towers.
sentences.chinese: 这两个树种持有着这片干旱的高原和岩石山的水资源。

sentences.english: In this paper were studied tree species and allocation model in regeneration of farmland shelterbelt.
sentences.chinese: 对农田防护林更新树种和配置模式进行了分析研究。

sentences.english: Japanese plum (Prunus salicina ) is one of important fruit tree among China and world.
sentences.chinese: 中国李是我国和世界广泛栽培的重要果树树种之一。

sentences.english: Cleidiocarpon cavaleriei, native to south China, is a tree species of economic importance.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶果是一种重要的经济树种，原产于我国南部。

sentences.english: Australian tree with sour red fruit.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲树种，红色果实，带酸味。

sentences.english: Loquat (Eriobotrya japonica Lindl. ) originated from China is a well-known, characteristic tree species.
sentences.chinese: 枇杷是原产于我国的名优特色树种。

sentences.english: There are many well-grown native flora on campus.
sentences.chinese: 南宁市高校校园内较多地使用乡土树种，长势良好。

sentences.english: In virtue Hong banyan the proportion that stood in all tree kinds biggest.
sentences.chinese: 在德宏榕树在所有树种中站的比重最大。

sentences.english: Chinese fir is one of good tree species during establishing anthropogenic vegetations on red earth in low hills.
sentences.chinese: 杉木是低丘红壤地区人工植被建造的优良树种。

sentences.english: In additions, evergreen species of Fagaceae were the major dominant species of community composition.
sentences.chinese: 壳斗科的常绿树种是本地主要建群种。

definition: tree, esp. with recognizable trunk (as opposed to 灌木[guan4 mu4], bush or shrub)
Catalpa bungei or Manchurian Catalpa, a tea plant
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
